meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of anagrams.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed creating anagrammatical word games.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammatical riddle left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in an anagrammatical way, rearranging thoughts effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The anagrammatical nature of the code made it difficult to decipher.

meanings.sent1: The anagrammatical phrases were cleverly crafted.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammatical party game brought laughter and confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts seemed to form an anagrammatical pattern, always rearranging.
meanings.sent5: The anagrammatical nature of the design revealed hidden messages.
